channel.title: How to change my client?
channel.description: hey guys, Quick question. I found a cool cource i like and have been coding it for a while but the client they gave me really isn't my favorite is their a way to get the server to load on to another client i have one i think is good i would do this even if it ment re coding so i just want to know if this is even possible and if so how? thanks guys!

item.title: How to change my client?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]The items aren’t going to fix anything if the client won’t connect.

There’s an error somewhere to do with the packets, or it’s rejecting the client UID, if it has one.[/quote]
I was meaning in general, to change a client to his…

Read full topic

item.title: How to change my client?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Well tbh, I don’t code that much, but some clients are not able to work with some servers. I think…, and by “items work” I meant make them work by adding the model files and ints into the new client.

item.title: How to change my client?
item.dc:creator: @b3ast b3ast
item.description:
@b3ast wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:2, topic:343167”]Seriously?, all you got to do is download another client and edit it so it goes to your/items work/etc. I believe…[/quote] in noob lanuage please? i have the other client i thought i’d have to go into the gui of the client and like change the ip address and i tried that and i failed so what do you mean by items and work?
